title: Multi Million Dollar Renovated Apartments Steps Away From Addison!
posting_body: ['The community recently completed a multi-million dollar renovation.', ' Stop by today and check out all our changes.', 'The community features a fitness center, iLounge business center, saltwater swimming pool with sundeck, outdoor kitchen, laundry center, and much more.', ' In addition, the community showcases newly remodeled 1 and 2 bedroom apartment homes with Texas-sized walk-in closets, upgraded interiors, and a designer paint finish.', ' You are going to love our new look!', ' .', 'Apartment Features', 'Newly Remodeled Apartment Homes', 'Black Appliance Package with Microwave', 'Designer Paint Finish', 'Breakfast Bar', 'Texas Sized Walk-in Closet', 'All New Faux Wood Flooring', 'Faux Granite Countertops', 'Ceiling Fans', 'Wood-Burning Fireplaces', 'Linen Closet', 'Kitchen Pantry', 'Upgraded Flooring in all Apartment Homes', 'Community Features', 'Saltwater Pool With Sun Deck', 'iLounge Business Center', 'Wagging Tails Dog Park Nearby', 'Laundry Center', 'Ample Parking', 'New Fitness Center', 'Addison Shopping, Entertainment and Dining Nearby', 'Walking Paths', 'New Outdoor Pool Furniture', 'Preferred Employee Program available', 'DART Addison Transit Center Nearby', 'Enjoy easy access to premier shopping/dining at The Galleria and Addison Circle.', 'Located near the North Dallas Toll Road.', 'Please call Desiree', 'show contact info', 'mention ad 174', 'DASH Apartment Locators']
